titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that public schools should conduct ceremonies and other activities to educate and inform students about the sacrifice and commitment of veterans of the United States Armed Forces.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 10/2/1998--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that public schools should conduct ceremonies and other activities to educate and inform students about the sacrifice and commitment of veterans of the U.S. armed forces.
